optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#cookie-notification > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button#cookie_decline

test.waitForVisible: body > div#cookie-notification > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button#cookie_decline
